page.title: 06Sports Facilities in Wooler
page.content:
Sport is a major recreational activity.Football matches are played on Sundays, either at home or away to one of the surrounding villages. The Cricket Club meets at the Foot of Whitsun Hill and the team plays in the local villages league. There is a thriving Tennis Club with members of all ages. Wooler Golf Club is on the top of DodLaw, some three miles from the town. There is also a Bowling Club.
Throughout the winter, Glendale Middle School provides further sporting facilities for badminton,netball,football,keep-fit, trampolining,swimming and indoor bowls.Local stables provide riding instruction and take groups out pony trekking.
